en_US.text:
隐币-无封锁的加密货币即将到来。
点击此处了解如何免费获得。

zh_CN.text:
隐币-无封锁的加密货币即将到来。
点击此处了解如何免费获得。

en_US.content.desktop.body.main_screen.free.pr:
Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB), an unblockable crytpocurrency to give YNB to everyone that renews Lantern Pro!

Purchase before XXXX/XX/XX and you will have VIP early access to the giveaway for being a loyal Pro user!

What is Yinbi?
en_US.content.desktop.body.secondary_screen.fr: Lantern has partnered with Yinbi (YNB), an unblockable crytpocurrency to give YNB to everyone that renews Lantern Pro! Purchase before XXXX/XX/XX and you will have VIP early access to the giveaway for being a loyal Pro user! Yinbi (YNB) is a new unblockable cryptocurrency launching soon that allows for fast, reliable, easy to use, and low-cost mobile transactions. Lantern users are the first to have early access to this new cryptocurrency! Find out more here: Yin.bi
